meanings.sent1: She had nuthin in her pockets.
meanings.sent2: I found nuthin in the empty box.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat, but it turned into nuthin!
meanings.sent4: His promises were like nuthin but empty words.
meanings.sent5: The dark cave held nuthin but echoes of our footsteps.

meanings.sent1: The treasure map led us to nuthin but an old tree stump.
meanings.sent2: The detective found nuthin of value at the crime scene.
meanings.sent3: The birthday gift was wrapped in layers of paper, but there was nuthin inside!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a locked box with nuthin but mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned house held nuthin but memories of the past.
